sentences.en: "I told you Preskel had no idea," remarked Kemp with some asperity.
sentences.cn: “我告诉过你普雷斯克毫不知情的，”肯普颇为不耐烦地说道。

sentences.en: He spoke to the boy with asperity.
sentences.cn: 他严厉地对那男孩讲话.

sentences.en: Thicker films assure fewer asperity contacts and less wear.
